movies.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies.plot: In the pre-Civil War United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery. Facing cruelty as well as unexpected kindnesses Solomon struggles not only to stay alive, but to retain his dignity. In the twelfth year of his unforgettable odyssey, Solomonâ€™s chance meeting with a Canadian abolitionist will forever alter his life.

movies.title: The Last King of Scotland
movies.plot: Young Scottish doctor, Nicholas Garrigan decides it's time for an adventure after he finishes his formal education, so he decides to try his luck in Uganda, and arrives during the downfall of President Obote. General Idi Amin comes to power and asks Garrigan to become his personal doctor.

events.title: Idi Amin overthrows president Milton Obote
hijacked Air France Flight 139 lands at Entebbe Airport in Uganda

movies.title: The Motorcycle Diaries
movies.plot: Based on the journals of Che Guevara, leader of the Cuban Revolution. In his memoirs, Guevara recounts adventures he and best friend Alberto Granado had while crossing South America by motorcycle in the early 1950s.

movies.title: The Iron Lady
movies.plot: A look at the life of Margaret Thatcher, the former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, with a focus on the price she paid for power.

events.title: Margaret Thatcher becomes the UK's first female Prime Minister
the "Bloody Saturday" riot occurs in Brixton
The General Belgrano is sunk in the Falklands Islands
The Conservative Party Conference is bombed
Maragret Thatcher leaves 10 Downing Street in tears

movies.title: 127 Hours
movies.plot: The true story of mountain climber Aron Ralston's remarkable adventure to save himself after a fallen boulder crashes on his arm and traps him in an isolated canyon in Utah.

events.title: Emily Davison runs onto the track at the Epsom Derby

movies.title: One Day
movies.plot: A romantic comedy centered on Dexter and Emma, who first meet during their graduation in 1988 and proceed to keep in touch regularly. The film follows what they do on July 15 annually, usually doing something together.

events.title: Dexter Mayhew and Emma Morley agree to just be friends

movies.title: The Lovely Bones
movies.plot: After being brutally murdered, 14-year-old Susie Salmon watches from heaven over her grief-stricken family -- and her killer. As she observes their daily lives, she must balance her thirst for revenge with her desire for her family to heal.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 45 nominations.

movies.title: Mr. Turner
movies.plot: Eccentric British painter J.M.W. Turner  lives his last 25 years with gusto and secretly becomes involved with a seaside landlady, while his faithful housekeeper bears an unrequited love for him.
movies.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 64 nominations.
